definition: to take up duty as/to assume a position/to assume/to take on (an office)
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: Any man can be a father.
She won't pay any more attention to us if she becomes a manager-assistant.
sentences.chinese: 如果她當上經理助理就會把我們不放在眼裏。

sentences.english: Assange fathered him in his teens with his then-girlfriend.
sentences.chinese: 阿桑格與他當時的女友在十幾歲時就當上了爹媽。

sentences.english: Costa, meanwhile, resumed his role as Flamengo coach.
sentences.chinese: 這期間科斯塔重新當上了弗拉門戈主教練。

sentences.english: After their graduation from college, Wang Hai became a teacher, while Li Ping turned manager.
sentences.chinese: 大學畢業後，王海做了教師，而李平當上了經理。

sentences.english: ' And his answer was: 'When you become the Monkey King, you can see me.
sentences.chinese: 二哥答道，“你當上美猴王的那天，就能見到我了。”

sentences.english: He became Lord Mayor of London, and lent large sums of money to the king.
sentences.chinese: 他後來當上了倫敦市長，連國王缺錢花時都要向他借。

sentences.english: Dabao to others when the body double, oneself was beaten face is swollen.
sentences.chinese: 大寶給別人當上了替身演員，自己被打得臉都腫了。

sentences.english: He became a railroad locomotive fireman with the Southern Railroad.
sentences.chinese: 他在南方鐵路公司當上了鐵路機車司爐工。

sentences.english: After serving his apprenticeship as a toolmaker, he became a manager.
sentences.chinese: 結束了工具匠的學徒期以後，他當上了經理。

sentences.english: Maria finished school, and then became the librarian of the Nantucket athenaeum .
sentences.chinese: 中學畢業後，瑪麗當上了南塔克特學會的圖書管理員。

sentences.english: From being a librarian she is now an MP.
sentences.chinese: 她從一個圖書館管理員當上了目前的下議院議員。

sentences.english: Then one thing led to another and now I am a news anchor myself.
sentences.chinese: 就這樣，機緣巧合的，我就當上了新聞主播。

sentences.english: Later he became a river superintendent.
sentences.chinese: 後來又當上了江漢關監督。

sentences.english: The month's trial over, Oliver was formally apprenticed.
sentences.chinese: 一個月的試用期結束了，奧立弗正式當上了學徒。

sentences.english: I pay when top10 is achieved on google and yahoo in usa.
sentences.chinese: 我要當上十大谷歌和雅虎在美國取得的。
